column2: report marked “P1”, which most emphatically recorded the objection of the
Petitioner against the said identification parade, in its entirety?

column1: These  questions  of  law  arise  founded  upon  the  Appellant’s  allegation  that  the
prosecution  had  failed  to  prove  beyond  reasonable  doubt  that  it  was  he  (the
Appellant)  along  with  the  2nd  Accused  who  committed  robbery  of  an  item  of

this Court against the Judgment of the High Court.]
